Name: Psycho Killer Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Strucchi Red Bitter (Campari-style liqueur) infused with cacao nibs
15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Review: This short bittersweet spirituous cocktail makes for a very tasty aperitif. (To make cocoa nib-infused liqueur, add 2 tablespoons of cocoa nibs to one 70cl or 75cl bottle. Leave to infuse for one hour and then strain to remove cocoa nibs. Pour back into bottle and mark bottle accordingly.
History: Created in 2014 by Jillian Vose for the 3rd volume of The Dead Rabbit menu, New York City, USA. Jillian used Redbreast 12 year old Irish whiskey.
